properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 8:27AM PST until February 6 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest wind 10 to 15 kt with gusts to 20 kt, shifting
to west overnight. A few gusts to 25 kt possible this evening
through Wednesday night. Seas 11 to 15 feet at 16 seconds
expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 60
NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY
